fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test case used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test case

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the test case is in the current state

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this test case

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test; requirement tested

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this test case is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Issue
fields.description: Used to highlight the shared step, e.g., to mark it as an issue.

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration for this test suite.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test suite.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test suite.

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test suite.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why  the current test suite is in the current state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently assigned to the test suite.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test suite

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this test plan will execute.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test plan.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test plan.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Workflow status.  Active = tests in this test plan must be run; Inactive = tests in this test plan no longer need to be run

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: Reason for the current test plan state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this test plan.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test plan

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the change request used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this change request

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this change request is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this change request is associated

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the change request

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the change request is in the current state

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Business objective of this change, with links to supporting documents

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this epic to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the epic

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this epic is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this epic will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the epic

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the epic is in its current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the issue used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this issue

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this issue is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this issue is associated

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the issue

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the issue is in the current state

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Actual or potential problem and its impact on the project

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this feature to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the feature

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this feature is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this feature will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the feature

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the feature is in its current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the task used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this task

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this task is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this task is associated

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the task

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the task is in the current state

fields.name: Description
fields.description: How to implement this task, with links to resources and supporting documents

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the risk used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this risk

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this risk is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this risk is associated

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the risk

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the risk is in the current state

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Potential cause of divergence from plan, its impact on business goals, and steps taken to mitigate the risk

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test case used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test case

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the test case is in the current state

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this test case

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test; requirement tested

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this test case is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the requirement used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this requirement

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this requirement is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this requirement is associated

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the requirement

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the requirement is in the current state

fields.name: Description
fields.description: User activity or constraint enabled when this is implemented, with links to supporting documents

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the bug used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person investigating or fixing the bug, or verifying the fix

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this bug is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: Proposed = for triage; Active = approved, not yet fixed; Resolved = fix not yet verified; Closed = fix verified

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the bug is in the current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the review used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this review

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this review is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration of the product with which this review is associated

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the review

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the review is in the current state

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Server-side data for a set of steps to be tested.

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the task through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Test Suite
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activites for a specific feature, requirement, or user story.

workItemTypes.name: Requirement
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the requirement through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Test Plan
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activities for a specific milestone or release.

workItemTypes.name: Change Request
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle

workItemTypes.name: Issue
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track changes through the MSF for CMMI Process Improvement life cycle.

workItemTypes.name: Review
workItemTypes.description: This work item tracks reviews and the results.

workItemTypes.name: Risk
workItemTypes.description: Includes information to track the work to mitigate a risk.

actions.value: Tests in this test suite are now active and can be run
Removed from planning and test execution
Plan test cases for this test suite
Completed testing for this test suite
Code Complete and System Test Passed
Complete and Does Not Require Review/Test

behaviors.description: Enables work items to be ordered relative to other work items
behaviors.name: Ordered
